entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Blue River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
